response.original_title: Suzanne Ciani And The Wave:  Live!
response.overview: Called the female Chopin and New Age Music's first female star, five-time Grammy nominee composer/pianist Suzanne Ciani brings you an unforgettable evening of music that will enchant and inspire you.  At the historic Herbst Theatre in San Francisco, Suzanne is joined onstage by an all-star group of musicians to form "The Wave," an instrumental supergroup the likes of which has never before been seen.  Enjoy a behind-the-scenes visit to Suzanne's spectacular seaside home, where she shares her insights into composing music and life in general.  This intimate portrait of one of AMerica's most important female composers will be on you enjoy over and over.  Recorded in highest quality digital and edited for PBS.
response.title: Suzanne Ciani And The Wave:  Live!
